code: @Override public RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(RestRequest restRequest, NodeClient client) throws IOException {     GetPipelineRequest request = new GetPipelineRequest(Strings.splitStringByCommaToArray(restRequest.param("id"))).     request.masterNodeTimeout(restRequest.paramAsTime("master_timeout", request.masterNodeTimeout())).     return channel -> client.admin().cluster().getPipeline(request, new RestStatusToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
